title: Farasiko Tokarei
text:
Farasiko Tokarei is a Fijian <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> footballer who represented <a href="Fiji%20national%20rugby%20league%20team">Fiji national rugby league team</a> in the <a href="2000%20Rugby%20League%20World%20Cup">2000 World Cup</a>.
In 2000 he played club football for the Tumbarumba Greens in the <a href="Group%209%20Rugby%20League">Group 9 Rugby League</a> competition. In 2003 Tokarei was the <a href="player-coach">player-coach</a> of the Nabua Broncos. After residing in Australia as a resident he won the 2019 Scott Hargreaves Murray Cup with Tumbarumba
